metadata.title: CVE-2012-0825 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Drupal 6.x before 6.23 and 7.x before 7.11 does not verify that AttributeExchange (AX) information is signed, which allows remote attackers tomodify potentially sensitive AX information without detection via aman-in-the-middle (MITM) attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0825` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.14-1').
